contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionarypar|Karen}} '''Karen''' may refer to: ==In names== * [[Karen (name)]], a given name (and list of people with the name) ==In people== * [[Karen people]], an ethnic group in Burma and Thailand ** [[Karen languages]], spoken by the Karen people * [[House of Karen]], an historical feudal family of Tabaristan, Iran ==In places== * [[Karen, Kenya]], a suburb of Nairobi * [[Hualien, Taiwan]], or Karen ==In entertainment and media== * [[Karen (1964 TV series)|''Karen'' (1964 TV series)]], an NBC sitcom starring Debbie Watson * [[Karen (1975 TV series)|''Karen'' (1975 TV series)]], an ABC sitcom starring Karen Valentine * [[Plankton (SpongeBob SquarePants)#Karen|Karen]], Plankton's "computer" W.I.F.E. on the animated TV series, ''SpongeBob SquarePants'' * Karen, a character in ''[[Mermaid Melody Pichi Pichi Pitch]]'' media ==In other uses== * [[KAREN]] or Kiwi Advanced Research and Education Network ==See also== * [[Karren (name)]] * [[Garen (disambiguation)]] * [[Tropical Storm Karen (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}}
